attributes.comment:
Director, Management Division
U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services
Department of Homeland Security
111 Massachusetts Avenue, NW, 3rd Floor
Washington D.C. 20529

Re: Docket number USCIS-2006-0044

To whom it may concern:

I am the parent of a beautiful daughter from China. We are planning to go back to
China next year to adopt our second child. Because of changes in China?s
adoption process, we will most likely have to pay the fees for the I-600/600A
(Petition to Classify Orphan as an Immediate Relative) and for fingerprinting twice.
It?s bad enough that we will be forced to pay these fees again, but when I found
out that the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services plans to raise these fees
up to 66%, I was horrified. Adoption is expensive enough! We are trying to give a
child a better life here in America. I hope you will not raise your fees and consider
increasing the time that the I-600 and fingerprints are valid.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,

Amy Harris
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Amy Harris
